Standard Scaler¶

class clumpy.preprocessing.StandardScaler¶

Bases: object

Standardize z features by removing the mean and scaling to unit variance for each initial states.

fit(J)¶

Compute the mean and std to be used for later scaling.

Parameters

J (pandas dataframe.) – A two level z column is expected.

inverse_transform(J)¶

Scale back the data to the original representation

Parameters

J (pandas dataframe.) – A two level z column is expected.

Returns

Return type

Standardized J.

transform(J)¶

Perform standardization by centering and scaling

Parameters

J (pandas dataframe.) – A two level z column is expected.

Returns

Return type

Standardized J.
